appeal based on weight of evidence before tribunal

administrative appeals tribunal act 1975 (cth), ss. 37 (1), 44 (1). on an appeal from a decision of the administrative appeals tribunal affirming a deportation order made by the minister for immigration the appellant argued that: (1) the decision of the tribunal was against the evidence or the weight of the evidence, and that the decison was unreasonable in all the circumstances; and (2) that the tribunal erred in giving weight to an irrelevant decision.
